description:
Job Description

Looking for a Career? 43 years in business, a global pandemic and still going strong!

Well-established Limousine Service based in North Hollywood seeks a Dispatcher/Reservation Agent Mon, Tues, Wed and Friday 6am-2:15pm (total 33 hours per week) with opportunity to cover shifts and work additional hours.

Benefits include: Vacation and Personal Days after a probationary period + medical insurance.

Candidates *MUST* have strong customer service and communication skills in the Limousine

industry or a related field such as Courier, Hotel, Fleet Vehicles.

Livery Coach software experience is a plus!

As one of the premiere limousine services in Southern California, we have dispatchers in our office 24/7/365.

We provide paid training and offer a great, professional but casual environment!

This job requires someone with a strong ability to multi-task, and a keen attention to detail. As the key liaison between our clients and chauffeurs, you will need to handle many details and coordinate the activities of our fast-paced office as well as the movements of up to a few dozen vehicles simultaneously.

DUTIES:

  • Communicate with clients, including high profile corporate executives and celebrities in a clear, positive and professional manner.
  • Give price quotes and recommend the most efficient pick-up time and vehicle to suit the client's needs and geography.
  • Input reservations into our system many times while you are on the phone with a client.
  • Route, schedule and coordinate the vehicles.
  • Remain in regular contact with chauffeurs.
  • Regularly check airline schedules for any changes to flight arrivals.
  • Resolve dispatch related chauffeur issues and coordinate resolutions with senior management.
  • Light accounting and other paperwork.
  • Perform miscellaneous projects as needed.
  • Excellent oral and written communication skills.
  • Computer literate. Must type a minimum of 40wpm
  • Ability to handle multiple tasks.
  • Ability to work as a team player.
  • Must be superior problem solver, detail oriented, quick-thinker.
  • Thorough knowledge of the Los Angeles and Southern CA area.
  • Work well under pressure in a fast-paced work environment.
  • Must pass a pre-employment background check.
  • Positive references are a MUST and will be contacted.
  • Must sign a confidentiality contract.
  • Previous limousine service or similar (courier, etc.) experience a plus
  • *MUST** have prior relative experience: Limousine, Courier, Transportation, Travel Agency, Hotel.

!!!!!! Please DO NOT APPLY if you do not have relative experience !!!!!!
